name: My Pumpkin Patch
description:
Sacrifice you precious pumpkins to summon Pumpkin Ghouls to fight off hordes of Zombies!

IMPORTANT TUTORIALS:

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Play In FullScreen!

Press Space to interact.

Go to the well and press Space to fill up bucket!

Gates across Stone Road Can be opened  by pressing space if you have enough points.

Dont get Touched By Zombies!
